name: curatedTCGAData-mcp
description: Conversational tools for accessing and working with TCGA cancer genomics data through the curatedTCGAData Bioconductor package

tools.name: list_cancer_types
tools.description: List all available TCGA cancer types with their disease codes and descriptions

returns.description: Data frame with columns: Code (disease abbreviation), Name (full cancer name), Subtype_Data (whether subtype data is available)

examples: Show me all TCGA disease codes

tools.name: list_assays_for_disease
tools.description: Show what data types (assays) are available for a specific TCGA disease code

returns.description: List containing diseaseCode, version, available_assays (character vector), and count

examples: What assays are available for breast cancer?
Show me data types for BRCA
What can I download for ovarian cancer?

tools.name: build_tcga_mae
tools.description: Build a MultiAssayExperiment object with specified disease codes and assay types. Supports wildcards in assay names (e.g., 'CN*' for all copy number data)

diseaseCode.description: Character vector of TCGA disease codes (e.g., c('BRCA', 'OV'))

assays.description: Character vector of assay types. Supports wildcards (e.g., 'CN*', 'RNA*')

dry.run.description: If TRUE, preview what will be downloaded without actually downloading

returns.description: Integrated multi-omic data object, or preview data.frame if dry.run=TRUE

examples: Get breast cancer RNA-seq and mutation data
Build a dataset with BRCA RNA-seq
Download LUAD and LUSC with all copy number assays

tools.name: extract_primary_tumors
tools.description: Filter a MultiAssayExperiment to include only primary tumor samples (TCGA sample code 01)

returns.description: Filtered MultiAssayExperiment with only primary tumor samples

tools.name: get_clinical_data
tools.description: Extract clinical variables from a MultiAssayExperiment. Can optionally extract standard clinical variables for a specific disease code

diseaseCode.description: Optional disease code to get standard clinical variables

returns.description: Clinical data with patients as rows and variables as columns

tools.name: get_subtype_info
tools.description: Extract cancer subtype information from a MultiAssayExperiment, including mapping of column names to subtype classifications

returns.description: List with 'map' (subtype mapping) and 'data' (subtype values), or NULL if no subtypes available

tools.name: describe_assay
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific assay/experiment in a MultiAssayExperiment

assay_name.description: Name of the assay to describe

returns.description: Information about the assay including class, dimensions, feature names, sample names, and metadata

examples: Show me details about the copy number data

tools.name: split_by_sample_type
tools.description: Split assays in a MultiAssayExperiment by TCGA sample type codes, creating separate experiments for each sample type

sample_codes.description: Character vector of TCGA sample codes (e.g., '01' for primary tumor, '10' for blood normal)

returns.description: MultiAssayExperiment with experiments split by sample type

examples: Create separate experiments for each sample type

tools.name: tcga_help
tools.description: Display help information about using curatedTCGAData tools

sample_types.03: Primary Blood Derived Cancer - Peripheral Blood
